text: Evil Dead is a horror movie series from Renaissance Pictures, Rosebud Releasing, Viacom International, Paramount Pictures, MCA, Inc., Universal Pictures, Sony, and TriStar Pictures. There are evil demonic zombies (deadites) as antagonists in the movie's plot. The Evil Dead was released in 1981, Evil Dead 2 was released in 1987, Evil Dead 3 was released in 1992 and Evil Dead 1 (Remake Version) was released in 2013. Category:The Evil Dead (franchise) Category:Series of movies Category:Horror movies
title: Evil Dead
